content.question: In 2017 Sabrina earned an annual salary of $100,000 as an engineer. In 2018, her income rose to $105,000. The inflation rate in 2018 was 2%. How did Sabrinaâ€™s nominal income and real income change in 2018 compared to 2017?

choices.label: Nominal income decreased and real income decreased.
Nominal income decreased and real income did not change.
Nominal income increased and real income decreased.
Nominal income increased and real income did not change.
Nominal income increased and real income increased.

content.answer: Nominal income increased and real income increased.

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
